message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $1,200,000.  What do you think?

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600,000. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Can we discuss this further?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but $600,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to negotiate, how about we meet in the middle at $1,000,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $1,000,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $700,000. Can we consider that?
